channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ME
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ME

item.title: Report E-2024030415
item.description:
Report E-2024030415

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-22T18:13:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-05
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: ME
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report X-2024030460
item.description:
Report X-2024030460

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-19T15:11:49+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-07
  • City: SACO
  • State: ME
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: TRAILER ARRIVED FROM HUB PACKAGE WAS TAKEN OFF TRAILER AS DAMAGED. DescribePack: PACKAGE WAS WET AND APPEARED AT ONE BOTTLE HAD LEAKED APPROX. 4 LIQUID OUNCES INSIDE AND OUTSIDE OF SHIPPING BOX. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: AT UNLOAD, PACKAGE WAS PUT IN A DAMAGE BIN AND BROUGHT TO QA FOR INSPECTION.
